qas.question: What islet was damaged by Cyclone Meli in 1979?
How many cyclones effected Tuvalu during the 1996-97  cyclone season?
What cyclone caused major damage to vegetation on all islands on Tuvalu?
What was the first cyclone to strike Tuvalu during the 1996-97 season?

context: <a0_0>Cyclone Bebe<a0_0/> in 1972 caused severe damage to Funafuti. <a1_0>Funafuti's Tepuka Vili Vili<a1_0/> islet was devastated by Cyclone Meli in 1979, with all its vegetation and most of its sand swept away during the cyclone. Along with a tropical depression that affected the islands a few days later, Severe Tropical <a3_0>Cyclone Ofa<a3_0/> had a major impact on Tuvalu with most islands reporting damage to vegetation and crops. <a4_0>Cyclone Gavin<a4_0/> was first identified during 2 March 1997, and was the first of <a2_0>three<a2_0/> tropical cyclones to affect Tuvalu during the 1996–97 cyclone season with Cyclones Hina and Keli following later in the season.
